page.prototype: .Open as A5Storage::CallResult (BYREF Manager as P, [NameCache as A5Storage::NameCache, ] ConnectionStringIn as C [, Passphrase as C])

argument.name: BYREF Manager
argument.description: The variable to be populated with the DNS manager if the open call succeeds. You must dimension the variable as shown below before passing it to this function.

argument.name: NameCache
argument.description: An optional name cache for looking up connection strings by name.

argument.name: ConnectionStringIn
argument.description: The connection string for the DNS manager.

argument.name: Passphrase
argument.description: The passphrase with which the connection string was encrypted (if any).

return.name: result
return.description: The a CallResult object with properties that describe any error returned. Check the Success property to see if the function succeeded.
